00045 /**
00046  * Session backend using the built-in PHP session handlers
00047  *
00048  * @category   Colony
00049  * @package    Bee
00050  * @copyright  Copyright (c) Army of Bees (www.armyofbees.com)
00051  * @license    http://www.opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.php MIT License
00052  */
00053 class Bee_Session_Native
00054 {
00055 
00056     /**
00057      * Database object
00058      * @var Bee_Db_Abstract
00059      */
00060     private $_db = null;
00061 
00062     /**
00063      * Constructor for the class. Just sets some values for other functions.
00064      *
00065      * @param array $config The configuration to use for connection
00066      */
00067     public function __construct( &$config = array() )
00068     {
00069         // Verify that configuration is in an array.
00070         if( !is_array( $config ) )
00071             throw new Bee_Session_Native_Exception('Configuration must be in an array');
00072 
00073         // Verify that a db object is passed
00074         if( !isset( $config['db'] ) )
00075             throw new Bee_Session_Native_Exception('Configuration is missing db');
00076         if( !($config['db'] instanceof Bee_Db_Abstract) )
00077             throw new Bee_Session_Native_Exception('Configuration is not Bee_Db_Abstract');
00078     
00079         $this->_db =& $config['db'];
00080         
00081         $this->timeout = $config['session_timeout'];
00082         $this->domain = $config['session_domain'];
00083         $this->path = $config['session_path'];
00084     }
00085     
00086     /**
00087      * Loads the session from the database
00088      *
00089      * @return void
00090      */
00091     private function _loadSession()
00092     {
00093 
00094         // Check if we've got an existing session stored
00095         $input =& Bee_Input::filterInput();
00096         if ( !array_key_exists( 'session', $input ) )
00097         {
00098             $this->newSession();
00099         }
00100         else
00101         {
00102         
00103                         session_start();
00104 
00105             $this->_id = $input['session'];
00106 
00107             if ( $_SESSION['session_id'] == $this->_id )
00108             {
00109                 $this->_data = $_SESSION['data'];
00110                 $this->_time = $_SESSION['time'];
00111                 
00112                 setcookie( 'session', $this->_id, time() + $this->timeout, $this->path, $this->domain, FALSE, TRUE );
00113             }
00114             else
00115             {
00116                 $this->newSession();
00117             }
00118         }
00119     }
00120 
00121     /**
00122      * Creates a new empty session
00123      *
00124      * @return void
00125      */
00126     public function newSession()
00127     {
00128         $this->_id = sha1( uniqid( microtime() ) );
00129                 $this->_time = time();
00130         $this->_data = array();
00131 
00132         setcookie( 'session', $this->_id, time() + $this->timeout, $this->path, $this->domain, FALSE, TRUE );
00133         
00134                 session_start();
00135 
00136                 $_SESSION['session_id'] = $this->_id;
00137                 $_SESSION['data'] = array();
00138                 $_SESSION['time'] = time();
00139     }
00140 
00141     /**
00142      * Saves the session into the database
00143      *
00144      * @param array $data The data to be stored into the session
00145      * @return void
00146      */
00147     public function saveSession( &$data )
00148     {
00149     
00150         $this->_data = $data;
00151         
00152                 session_start();
00153 
00154                 $_SESSION['session_id'] = $this->_id;
00155                 $_SESSION['data'] = $data;
00156                 $_SESSION['time'] = time();
00157     }
00158     
00159     /**
00160      * Gets the stored data from the session
00161      *
00162      * @return array
00163      */
00164     public function getData()
00165     {
00166         $this->_loadSession();
00167 
00168         return $this->_data;
00169     }
00170 
00171     /**
00172      * Gets the stored time from the session
00173      *
00174      * @return int
00175      */    
00176     public function getTime()
00177     {
00178         $this->_loadSession();
00179 
00180         return $this->_time;
00181     }
00182 
00183     /**
00184      * Returns the string representation of the object
00185      *
00186      * @return string
00187      */
00188     public function __toString() {
00189         //$this->_loadSession();
00190         $out = "";
00191         $out .= "<pre>";
00192         $out .= "Session Object\n";
00193         $out .= "{\n";
00194         $out .= "\t[session_id] => ".$this->_id."\n";
00195         $out .= "\t[time] => ".date( DATE_RFC822, $this->_time )."\n";
00196         $out .= "\t[data] => ".print_r( $this->_data, true )."\n";
00197         $out .= "}\n";
00198         $out .= "</pre>";
00199         return $out;
00200     }

00202 }
